snippet.title: KEBENARAN DIBALIK INSIDEN MENGERIKAN DI LAB HEWAN! | Little Screamies Full Gameplay (No Commentary)
snippet.description:
Sebuah Laboratorium Eksperimen Rahasia untuk Hewan berada di tengah hutan belantara dengan tujuannya masih misterius. Namun, pada suatu malam, terjadi insiden mengerikan yang mengakibatkan banyak korban dalam laboratorium tersebut. Hanya ada satu ilmuwan yang selamat karena dia baru saja selesai liburan pada masa cutinya. Dia berniat untuk mencari tahu insiden tersebut sambil menemukan atasannya yaitu Profesor Gila yang diyakini sebagai orang yang bertanggung jawab atas insiden dalam laboratorium tersebut. Sebenarnya apa yang terjadi dalam Laboratorium tersebut? Apakah ilmuwan tersebut berhasil menemukan jawabannya dari Profesor Gila tersebut?

Kalian bisa merasakan sensasi kengerian yang akan dialami ilmuwan tersebut dalam Game Little Screamies yang dibuat oleh @WavGames_ (Tuan Rik "WAV" Oclon beserta rekan timnya) secara gratis melalui link berikut: https://nukepop-games.itch.io/little-screamies

English translation:
A Secret Animal Experimentation Laboratory sits in the middle of the wilderness with its purpose still a mystery. However, one night, a terrible incident occurred that resulted in many casualties in the laboratory. There was only one scientist who survived because he had just finished a holiday on his leave. He intends to find out about the incident while finding his superior, The Mad Professor, who is believed to be the person responsible for the incident in the laboratory. What exactly happened in the laboratory? Did the scientist manage to find the answer from The Mad Professor?

You can feel the sensation of horror that the scientist will experience in the Little Screamies Game made by @WavGames_ (Mr. Rik ‘WAV’ Oclon and his team) for free via the following link: https://nukepop-games.itch.io/little-screamies

Timestamps:
00:00 Intro
00:25 Prologue
01:50 Lab Outskirts
04:15 Infiltration
18:02 Huge Problem
20:05 Unlikely Ally
29:41 Critical Research
37:10 Chases The Mad Professor
39:22 Final Boss (With A Plot Twist)
42:28 The Ending
43:07 Credits
45:11 Closing

#littlescreamies #indiegames #itchiohorror #horrorgaming #gamejam #itchio #josephbremantasamuel
